category_1.title: Pamper Your Pet with HPZâ„¢ Premium Pet Strollers

products.title: HPZâ„¢ PET ROVER Premium Stroller for Small/Medium/Large Dogs, Cats and Pets (Navy Blue)
products.body_html:
Available Colors

Navy

Red

Sky Blue

For Small / Medium / Large Pets up to 75Lbs / 34Kg

Pamper your fur baby with the signature, all-terrain, heavy-duty pet stroller that was truly made to last. The Premium model is our most popular product and it offers weather-resistant fabric, zipper-free canopy, an expandable compartment (for more than one pet), reversible handlebar and plenty of storage. The expert-engineered design allows you to unfold it quickly with one hand, so you can focus on what really matters: FUN!

  • COMFORT RIDE Features one-hand simple mechanism that can quickly fold and unfold it in seconds, and takes up minimal space when folded. Premium Anti-vibration system with Comfort-Ride wheels, 360-degree Rotating Front wheels, and Rear Braking system.

  • RIGID ALL TERRAIN Extra-thickness Heavy-duty & Light-weight frame. Strong construction uses stainless steel tubes, so it is extremely durable!

  • WEATHER PROOF Our breathable mesh top cover made of high-density odorless and UV-reflective material. Included 2 pads for the pet compartment made of high-density Oxford 1600D Polyester fabric which are comfortable, stain-resistance and machine-washable.

  • CONVERTIBLE SIZE You can change the size of the internal compartment, so it can hold many pets in different size.

  • EXTRA STORAGE There are a large-volume under-basket, three smaller accessory bags and a bottle holder, so there is enough storage space when you travel, shopping, or strolling, with your loved pets.

  • No Assembly Required

Overall Dimensions
Opened: L 33" W 26" H 42"
Closed: L 13" w 26" H 37"

Pet Compartment Floor Dimensions
Reduced: L 15" W 18"
Expanded: L 30" W 18"

Weight
21 Lbs.

Max Capacity
75 Lbs.

products.body_html:

For Small / Medium Pets up to 50Lbs / 23Kg

Â 

Unleash the adventure! This versatile, 3-in-1 stroller has a detachable carrier and also works as a car seat for maximum convenience. The easy fold/unfold operation means that going from house, to car, to stroller is a snap! It comes with automotive-grade, pump-free rubber tires, a weather-resistant, dual-opening canopy and itâ€™s built on a rust-free, anodized gold aluminum frame that is virtually indestructible. Travel in style together for life.

  • Editors' Choice Award Winner of 2020 Dogster & Catster Magazines â˜… 3-IN-1 TRAVEL SYSTEM - Versatile, luxurious pet stroller has a detachable carrier and also works as a car seat for maximum convenience. Easy fold/unfold operation lets you take it wherever you go. (Pet Carrier is not for AIRLINE IN-CABIN Travel)
  • PUMP-FREE RUBBER WHEELS - Front suspension with four heavy duty automotive-grade, maintenance-free rubber tires reduce vibration and maximize stability, so your pet will enjoy a comfortable ride on any terrain.
  • LIGHTWEIGHT ALUMINUM STROLLER FRAME - Made of rust-free aluminum in an anodized gold color, this top-of-the-line stroller frame features elegant, functional and durable construction.
  • SAFE & DURABLE - Our premium stroller features reflective lines for night-time travel and two tethers in the basket to buckle your pet in snugly. It also includes an easy-to-clean machine-washable carrier pad and durable water-resistant fabric.
  • ERGONOMIC DESIGN & EASY SETUP - Reversible, height-adjustable handlebar and front and rear two-way canopy openings provide viewing flexibility. Stroller takes just five minutes to set up and boasts plenty of storage space.
  • No Assembly Required

products.title: HPZâ„¢ PET ROVER XL Extra-Long Premium Stroller for Small/Medium/Large Dogs, Cats and Pets (Black - 2nd Gen.)
products.body_html:
Available Colors

Black

Purple

Pink

For Small / Medium / Large Pets up to 75Lbs / 34Kg

Â 

Now thereâ€™s even more fun to love! The XL expands upon our popular Premium model to allow a whopping 35" of space (length-wise), perfect for a larger animal or multiple furry friends. The mesh cover can be opened for unobstructed access; and the weather-resistant canopy and rust-free, anodized gold aluminum frame were made to last. When your pet deserves the best and the biggest, this is the stroller you want.

Â 

  • Editors' Choice Award Winner of 2020 Dogster & Catster Magazines â˜… CONVERTIBLE SIZE COMPARTMENT - An upgraded & extra-long version of our highly-rated HPZ Pet Rover premium heavy duty pet stroller that can fully expanded to 35" long to fit a large pet or multiple smaller pets with 75-Lbs total weight capacity.
  • PUMP-FREE RUBBER WHEELS - Super-durable automotive-grade, maintenance-free rear rubber tires reduce vibration and maximize stability. 360-degree rotating front wheels with swivel locks for rough terrains, so your pet will enjoy a comfortable ride on any terrain. All wheels are covered by 3-year free replacement protection.
  • RIGID ALUMINUM FRAME & PREMIUM FABRICS - The stroller frame is made of rust-free aluminum in an anodized gold color. This top-of-the-line stroller frame features light-weight, elegant, functional and durable construction. Weather resistance canopy fabric and water/scratch-proof pet compartment fabric protect your pets from harsh elements and climates such as dust, rain, snow and heat waves.
  • ZIPPER-LESS CANOPY & REAR ENTRY - Innovative no-zipper features easy-locking/quick-release latches, giving you immediate access to your pet without having to fumble with zippers. Patented design front expansion allows 5" long additional space with a mesh cover that can be opened for unobstructed access to your pet or to act as a food/water bowl tray. Large zippered rear entry allows your pet to easily enter the compartment.
  • PET-FRIENDLY CONVENIENT FEATURES - Reversible handlebar and 3-stop canopy opening levels provide viewing flexibility. Large-volume under-basket, three smaller accessory pockets, and a bottle holder offer plenty of storage space when you travel, shop, or stroll with your loved pets. Hand-free one-step quick folding. 1-minute plug&play assembly requires only the snap on of the front and rear wheels which takes less than one minute.
  • No Assembly Required

products.body_html:
Available Colors

Black

Blue

Green Camo

For Small / Medium / Large / X-Large Pets up to 100Lbs / 43Kg

Â 

In collaboration with veterinary professionals, HPZ designed the Pet Rover Titan HD for pets with medical and mobility issues. The Titan HD features a patented access ramp and flip-down front lid for easy access without the need of pet being lifted. With bigger and older pets in mind, this is our biggest stroller with the max capacity of 100 pounds, making it the SUV of pet strollers. This heavy duty pet stroller includes four tethers inside providing ride share for multiple pets. A number of accessory hooks around the stroller offer ultimate convenience. Four heavy duty rubber wheels make this SUV of pet strollers durable on all terrain!

Â 

  • Editors' Choice Award Winner of 2021 Dogster Magazines â˜… INTEGRATED ACCESS RAMP - Our patented retractable access ramp and flip-down front lid allows pets, especially those with medical conditions and mobility difficulty, to enter and exit the stroller effortlessly, without the need of assistance from its owner.
  • SUPER-SIZE & 100LBS CAPACITY - With 100 pounds capacity and oversize pet compartment of 32" long by 20" wide, this heavy-duty pet stroller SUV offers plenty of space for a large pet or multiple small and medium pets to share rides comfortably.
  • 4x ALL-TERRAIN RUBBER WHEELS - All four durable and heavy-duty automotive-grade/pump-free/airless rubber tires offer excellent durability and superior ride quality for daily travel on all terrain. Swivel locks and front wheel suspension enhance stability even on rough terrain.
  • MULTI-PET DESIGNS - Super spacious pet compartment, four interior tethers and front/rear entries can comfortably accommodate one to several pets up to 100Lbs. Accessory hooks allow additional pets to travel alongside this pet stroller SUV. Three organizer pockets, cup holder and large under-basket made traveling easy and tidy.
  • HEAVY DUTY & DURABLE - A Weather-resistance canopy and water/scratch-proof pet compartment fabric shield your pets from harsh elements such as rain, snow, dust and high heat. Heavy-duty yet light-weight frame offers rigid construction using anodized aluminum alloys in luxurious gold color. This rust-free metal makes for an exceptionally attractive and durable product.
  • No Assembly Required

products.title: Premium Pet Burial & Cremation Ceremony Kit - Casket for Small to Large Dogs and Cats
products.body_html:
Every pet deserves a Sweet Goodbye. Give your beloved pet a farewell full of love and This is a soft, beautifully designed, handmade, premium shroud with a thick, protective woolen layer. It keeps your cherished pets safe and snug so they can be securely transported for burial or cremation and laid with care in their final resting place. Our customers love this softer option compared with a hard box pet casket.

faqs.question: What is a pet stroller and why would I need one?
faqs.answer: A pet stroller is a wheeled carriage designed for transporting pets. It resembles a traditional baby stroller but is specifically designed to accommodate pets comfortably and securely. Pet strollers provide a convenient way to take your pets on walks, outdoor adventures, or trips to the veterinarian. They are particularly useful for elderly pets, small pets, newly vaccinated pets, injured or recovering pets, or those with limited mobility.

faqs.question: What are the benefits of using a pet stroller?
faqs.answer: Using a pet stroller offers several benefits. It provides a safe and comfortable space for your pet during outings, protecting them from potential hazards, harsh weather, or aggressive animals. It allows pets with mobility issues to enjoy fresh air and outdoor surroundings. Pet strollers also offer convenience for pet owners, as they eliminate the need to carry pets in your arms, and provide storage space for pet supplies or personal belongings.

faqs.question: Are pet strollers safe for my pet?
faqs.answer: Yes, our pet strollers are designed with safety in mind. Our stroller models are built with sturdy construction, durable materials, and secure fastenings. We also feature a reliable braking system to keep it stationary when needed. It's also crucial to use the provided safety harness attachment to secure your pet inside the stroller and prevent them from jumping out.

faqs.question: How do I choose the right size stroller model for my pet?
faqs.answer: To choose the right size pet stroller, consider your pet's size, weight, and length. Measure your pet from nose to tail and from the shoulder to the ground. Compare these measurements with the interior dimensions of the stroller (which you can find by visiting our 'Compare Models' page on our website) to ensure your pet has enough space to sit, lie down, and turn comfortably. Be sure to also check the weight capacity of the stroller to ensure it can support your pet's weight.

faqs.question: What types of products does Petrover USA offer?
faqs.answer: Petrover USA specializes in providing a wide range of luxury pet strollers. These include models such as the HPZ Pet Rover Premium, HPZ Pet Rover XL, HPZ Pet Rover Prime, HPZ Pet Rover Lite, HPZ Pet Rover Titan HD, and HPZ Pet Rover Run. Each model is designed with unique features to cater to different customer needs.

faqs.question: How can I compare different pet stroller models?
faqs.answer: You can compare different pet stroller models by visiting our 'Compare Models' page on our website. Here, you will find detailed comparisons of the features, specifications, and prices of our various models.

faqs.question: Can I use a pet stroller for multiple pets?
faqs.answer: Yes, our pet stroller models are able to accommodate multiple pets with our different compartment sizes designed so they can comfortably lay or sit well. However, it's important to consider the weight capacity and size limitations to ensure that it can safely accommodate all of your pets.

faqs.question: Is a pet stroller suitable for all types of pets, including cats and dogs?
faqs.answer: Yes, a variety of our models are suitable for a wide range of pets, including cats and dogs. They can also be used for smaller animals like rabbits, guinea pigs, or ferrets. However, it's important to consider the size and weight of your pet when choosing a model to ensure it provides adequate space and support.

faqs.question: Does Petrover USA offer accessories for the pet strollers?
faqs.answer: Yes, Petrover USA offers a variety of stroller accessories. These include items such as travel bags, cup holders, and more. You can view and purchase them from our 'Stroller Accessories' page.

faqs.question: Can I use a pet stroller for both indoor and outdoor activities?
faqs.answer: Yes! Our models are versatile and can be used both outdoors and indoors as well. Our models provide a secure and confined space for your pet, which can be useful for situations such as vet visits, grooming sessions, or introducing your pet to a new environment, but also durability, for situations like hiking, jogging, and park adventures.

faqs.question: Which stroller model can I use for hiking or off-road adventures?
faqs.answer: Our Run stroller is specifically designed for outdoor adventures, including hiking or off-road terrains. This stroller features larger, air-filled tires for better traction and shock absorption, as well as durable frames and suspension systems to handle rough surfaces.

faqs.question: Are all the models foldable and easy to transport?
faqs.answer: Yes, our pet strollers are designed to be foldable, making them easy to transport and store. Foldable strollers are convenient for travel, car transportation, or storing in compact spaces. We offer a simple folding mechanism that allows you to collapse the stroller quickly and without much effort within all our models.

faqs.question: Can I take my pet on a flight with a pet stroller?
faqs.answer: Yes! We offer two models, the Lite and Bingo Combo, that are great for travel! Our Bingo combo is a stroller convertible model that is Airline In-Cabin compatible. Our Bingo Travel-Carrier Bag is approved to be used in-cabin, and we feature a combo stroller that can be detached from the bag for travel convenience. Our Lite model features a travel bag and a handle for ease of mobility but cannot be used in-cabin. However, you are able to use the stroller as checked baggage or as part of your pet's crate or carrier. It's essential to check the specific guidelines and requirements of the airline you are traveling with to ensure compliance.

faqs.question: How do I clean and maintain a pet stroller?
faqs.answer: Cleaning and maintaining our pet stroller is essential to ensure the comfort and hygiene of your pet. Our pet strollers have removable and machine-washable interior pads. You can usually spot clean the stroller fabric using a mild detergent and a cloth or sponge. It's important to keep up with cleaning and maintenance to preserve the stroller's longevity.

faqs.question: How does the braking system work on our Pet Rovers?
faqs.answer: The braking system in our strollers is operated through a foot-activated brake located near the rear wheels. By pressing down on the brake bar, it engages the brake mechanism and keeps the stroller stationary by locking the wheel axle.

faqs.question: Can I purchase a gift card?
faqs.answer: Yes, Petrover USA offers gift cards. These can be purchased directly from our website and make the perfect gift for pet owners.

faqs.question: What is the Rewards Program?
faqs.answer: Our Rewards Program allows customers to earn points with each purchase. These points can be redeemed for discounts and special offers. Visit our 'Rewards Program' page for more information on how to earn and redeem points.

faqs.question: Does Petrover USA offer free shipping and returns?
faqs.answer: Yes, Petrover USA offers free shipping and returns. We are committed to ensuring that our customers are 100% satisfied with their purchases. Visit our 'Free Shipping & Free Return' page for more information on our shipping and return policies.

faqs.question: Is there a time-limit on returns or exchanges?
faqs.answer: We offer a 60-day return policy for products purchased directly from PetRoverUSA.com. If you're not fully satisfied, you can return the item for a refund or exchange. Returned items must be sent back within 60 days of delivery. This offer is valid for returns from the 48 contiguous states and limited to one return per order/household within the 60-day period.

faqs.question: Where can I find information about shipping?
faqs.answer: You can find all information about our shipping policies and procedures on our 'Shipping Info' page. This includes details about shipping times, tracking your order, and more.

faqs.question: Do you offer international shipping?
faqs.answer: At this time, we do not offer international shipping accessibility. We deliver to all 50 US states, at free standard shipping, or expedited at additional costs. We also provide options for Canada and Mexico to deliver as well. For any further inquiries, feel free to contact us at (888) 265-0589.

faqs.question: How long does it take to ship the stroller?
faqs.answer: If stock is currently available, most orders placed by 3PM Pacific Time on weekdays except holidays will be processed and shipped the same day from our California fulfillment centers. Most orders will be processed within 24-48 hours after being placed.

faqs.question: How can I track the status of my shipment?
faqs.answer: Once your order is shipped, you should receive an email regarding a shipping notification as well as an attached tracking number. You should be able to track your product within 24 hours of notice.

faqs.question: What should I do if my stroller arrives damaged or defective?
faqs.answer: At HPZ, we take these situations very seriously. If you receive a damaged or defective stroller upon purchasing, feel free to email us at customerservice@petroverusa.com or call us at our service number (888) 265-0589, where one of our representatives can help further assist you.

faqs.question: Do I need to pay for return shipping?
faqs.answer: No, we do not charge our customers on return fees. However, shipping fees are non-refundable, and restocking fees may apply for items not in acceptable/resellable condition or if the return is not due to PetRoverUSA's error/fault.

faqs.question: Can I exchange my stroller for a different model or color?
faqs.answer: If you are not 100% satisfied with your stroller purchase, you are more than free to exchange your stroller for any other model we have available at the time.

faqs.question: Can I change the shipping address after placing my order?
faqs.answer: If you have placed your order, and it has not been shipped out yet, you can change your shipping address by contacting us through our service number (888) 265-0589 or email customerservice@petroverusa.com.

faqs.question: Does Petrover USA offer a warranty on its products?
faqs.answer: Yes, Petrover USA offers a lifetime warranty on our products. This is part of our commitment to providing high-quality, durable products. We also offer a 3-year wheel warranty that is covered with the purchase of your stroller. Visit our 'Life-Time Warranty' page for more information on our warranty terms and conditions.

faqs.question: What does the warranty cover?
faqs.answer: All HPZ products sold by authorized resellers are covered by an unprecedented lifetime warranty, starting from the day of purchase. The warranty covers defects in material or workmanship for the lifetime of the product, except for the wheels, which have a separate 3-year warranty. Proper residential use is required, and misuse, normal wear and tear, and specific exclusions are not covered. HPZ provides replacements for defective parts under the warranty, subject to certain conditions. The warranty is non-transferable and void if the product is resold or transferred. HPZ reserves the right to discontinue specific models or parts, offering replacements with equivalent alternatives.

faqs.question: What is the 3-year wheel warranty?
faqs.answer: Our 3-year wheel warranty is a special warranty we offer on all our strollers to ensure that you are satisfied with our products. We provide front and rear replacement wheels for normal and proper use, free of charge for 3 years from the purchase date. This limited coverage is non-transferable. Visit our 'Life-Time Warranty' page for more information regarding coverage.

faqs.question: How can I request an RMA?
faqs.answer: You can request an RMA (Return Merchandise Authorization) on our 'RMA Request' page. An RMA is required for all returns to ensure that your return is processed efficiently. This form may also be used to request replacement wheels or stroller parts that are covered under warranty.

faqs.question: Where can I find product manuals and videos?
faqs.answer: You can find product manuals and videos on our 'Product Manuals & Videos' page. These resources provide detailed instructions and demonstrations on how to use and maintain our products.

faqs.question: How can I register my product?
faqs.answer: You can register your product on our 'Register Product' page. Registering your product helps us provide you with efficient customer service and allows you to receive important updates and information about your product.
